# My Ktor API
A Kotlin web application using Ktor framework, created with qBoot.
## Getting Started
### Prerequisites - Java 21+ - Gradle 8+
### Running the Application
```bash ./gradlew run ```
The server will start on http://localhost:8080
### Available Endpoints
- `GET /` - Welcome message - `GET /health` - Health check endpoint
### Testing
```bash ./gradlew test ```
## Features
- Ktor 3.0.3 web framework - Kotlin 2.1.0 - Content negotiation with JSON serialization - Structured logging with Logback - Gradle build system - Cross-platform compatibility
## Learn More
- [Ktor Documentation](https://ktor.io/docs/) - [Kotlin Documentation](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/) - [Gradle Documentation](https://docs.gradle.org/)
